page.title: 10NEW TOWN TEENAGER'S LEISURE
page.content: A 15 YEAR OLD TEENAGER LIVES IN THIS NEW TOWN. HIS HOBBIES ARE DRAWING, AND PLAYING THE DRUMS. HE ALSO ENJOYS GOING OUT WITH HIS FRIENDS. HE IS ALSO IN A SMALL POP GROUP AND OFTEN PRACTICES WITH HIS FRIENDS IN HIS LEISURE TIME. HE PLAYS A LOT OF SPORT SUCH AS FOOTBALL,HOCKEY, BADMINTON, TENNIS, TABLE TENNIS, SNOOKER, POOL, BASKETBALL, CRICKET, RUGBY,WEIGHT TRAINING AND DARTS HE PERSUES HIS SPORT IN SCHOOL AND AFTER SCHOOL IN LOCAL SPORTS CENTRES. HE HAS TO BE TRANSPORTED BY HIS MOTHER IN HER CAR TO ALL HIS DESTINATIONS. SOMETIMES HE GOES TO VISIT HIS BROTHER IN BRISTOL, HE GOES TO BRISTOL BY TRAIN FROM A LOCAL STATION.
